name: jpverito-fullstack
description: Sistema de Gestión Educativa - JP Verito

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run dev:database" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.test:all: concurrently "cd cliente && npm test" "cd servidor && npm test"
scripts.setup:dev: npm run setup:env && npm run install:all && npm run docker:up
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd cliente && npm install && cd ../servidor && npm install && cd ../portable && npm install
scripts.docker:run:hostdb: docker run --rm -p 8080:8080 -e DB_HOST=host.docker.internal -e DB_PORT=3306 -e DB_NAME=jp3_db -e DB_USER=root -e DB_PASSWORD= -e JWT_SECRET=jp3verito2025secretkey --name jpverito jpverito:latest

author: JP Verito Team
